00003 import java.io.IOException;

00005 import modelManagement.exceptions.InvalidModelException;

00007 import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI;
00008 import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EFactory;

00010 import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EPackage;

00014 import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.xmi.impl.XMIResourceFactoryImpl;

00016 import org.apache.commons.io.FilenameUtils;
00017 
00026 public abstract class ModelManager {
00027 
00028         protected URI model;
00029         protected Resource resource;
00030         protected ResourceSet resourceSet = new ResourceSetImpl();
00031         protected EPackage ePackage = null;
00032         protected String fileExtension = Resource.Factory.Registry.DEFAULT_EXTENSION;
00033         
00034         protected abstract void initMetaModel();
00035 
00041         public ModelManager() {
00042                 this( "unnamed.xmi" );
00043         }
00044         
00048         public ModelManager(String modelPath) {
00049                 this( URI.createFileURI(modelPath) );
00050         }
00051         
00052         public ModelManager(URI model) {
00053                 init( model );
00054         }
00055 
00056         public void loadIt() throws InvalidModelException {     
00057                 resource = resourceSet.getResource(model, true);
00058         }
00059 
00060         public void saveIt() throws IOException {
00061                 if ( resource == null ) {
00062                         assert( getTopElement() != null );
00063                         saveAs( model );
00064                 }
00065                 resource.save(null);
00066         }
00067         
00068         public void saveAs(String pathname) throws IOException {
00069                 URI modelURI = URI.createFileURI(pathname);
00070                 saveAs(modelURI);               
00071         }
00072 
00073         public void saveAs(URI modelURI) throws IOException {
00074                 Resource aNewResource = createNewResource(modelURI);
00075                 setTopElementIn( aNewResource );
00076                 aNewResource.save(null);
00077         }
00078                 
00079         public void saveAsWithPropperExtension(String originalPathName) throws IOException {
00080                 String newFileName = replaceExtension(originalPathName, fileExtension); 
00081                 saveAs( newFileName );
00082         }
00083 
00084         //This should be private, but I wanted a test case.
00085         public String replaceExtension(String pathName, String extension) {
00086                 return FilenameUtils.removeExtension(pathName) + '.' + extension;
00087         }
00088         
00089         private void setTopElementIn(Resource aResource) {
00090                 setTopElementIn(getTopElement(), aResource);
00091         }
00092 
00093         private void setTopElementIn(EObject topElement, Resource aResource) {
00094                 aResource.getContents().add( topElement );              
00095         }
00096 
00097         public void validateIt() throws InvalidModelException {
00098                 assert(resource != null);
00099                 ModelValidator aModelValidator = new ModelValidator( resource );
00100                 aModelValidator.doIt();
00101         }
00102 
00103         public EObject getTopElement() {
00104                 EObject result = ( resource == null )? 
00105                                 null : resource.getContents().get(0);
00106                 return result;
00107         }
00108 
00109         public void setTopElement(EObject topElement ) {
00110                 if ( resource == null ) {
00111                         resource = createNewResource( model );
00112                 }
00113                 setTopElementIn(topElement, resource);
00114         }
00115         
00116         private Resource createNewResource(URI modelURI) {
00117                 return resourceSet.createResource( modelURI );
00118         }
00119 
00120         public String getNsURI() {
00121                 return ePackage.getNsURI();
00122         }
00123 
00124         public EFactory getFactory() {
00125                 return ePackage.getEFactoryInstance();
00126         }
00127 
00132         private void setResourceFactoryForFileExtension(String extension) {
00133                 resourceSet.getResourceFactoryRegistry().
00134                         getExtensionToFactoryMap().
00135                         put(extension, 
00136                                 new XMIResourceFactoryImpl());
00137         }
00138 
00139         protected void init(URI model) {
00140                 this.model = model;
00141                 setResourceFactoryForFileExtension( fileExtension );
00142                 initMetaModel();
00143         }
00144 
00145         public String getFileExtension() {
00146                 return fileExtension;
00147         }
00148 
00149         protected void setFileExtension(String fileExtension) {
00150                 this.fileExtension = fileExtension;
00151         }
00152 
00153 }
